description.easy:
- replay occurs at normal speed
- you have 10 seconds to select a color each turn
- you can make 1 mistake
description.normal:
- replay occurs at normal speed
- you have 5 seconds to select a color each turn
- you can’t make any mistakes
description.hard:
- replay occurs at a faster speed
- you have 3 seconds to select a color each turn
- you still can’t make any mistakes

translation.insteadOfColors: Instead of colors, each button will show a number between 1 and 4
translation.aboutTheGame: This game was designed and developed by Pedro Borges
